---
title: "New analysis plan template for new project proposals (v6)"
format: html
date: 02/02/2026
date-format: full
---

We have updated the analysis plan template that should be used for proposing new analytic projects using data in the PsychGen p471 project.

Please replace any locally saved versions with, and from here on make use of, the version available in the [Analysis plan section](https://psychgen.netlify.app/docs/psychgen_wiki/analysis_plan.html) of the wiki.
